SA05bst-108u:busto_14.23_0: sakalajanārthaṃ prati yā karuṇā sā kiṃ bhavato niyataspharaṇā /
SA05bst-108u:busto_14.23_1: yena na rakṣasi kilviṣavantaṃ bhavataḥ purato māṃ viruvantam //
SA05bst-108u:busto_14.24_0: nātha kṛpā te vyomaviśālā sattveṣu hi yathāmbudadhārā /

SA05bst-108u:busto_16.5_1: śambhu śaṅkara śuddhārtha buddhapadma namo 'stu te //
SA05bst-108u:115_0: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 17:
SA05bst-108u:117_0: atha khalu samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evameva lokadhātuparamparānabhilāpyānabhilāpya buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān kalpān kalpaprasarānabhidyotyamāno bhūyasyā mātrayā gāthābhigītena praṇidhānamakārṣīt -
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.1_0: yāvata keci daśaddiśi loke sarvatriyadhvagatā narasiṃhāḥ /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.1_1: tānahu vandami sarvi aśeṣān kāyatu vāca manena prasannaḥ //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.4_1: sarvajināna guṇān bhaṇamānastān sugatān stavamī ahu sarvān //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.5_1: dīpavarebhi ca dhūpavarebhiḥ pūjana teṣa jināna karomi //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.7_0: yā ca anuttarapūja udārā tānadhimucyami sarvajinānām /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.8_0: yacca kṛtaṃ mayi pāpu bhaveyyā rāgatu dveṣatu mohavaśena /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.8_1: kāyatu vāca manena tathaiva taṃ pratideśayamī ahu sarvam //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.9_0: yacca daśaddiśi puṇya jagasya śaikṣa aśaikṣapratyekajinānām /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.9_1: buddhasutānatha sarvajinānāṃ taṃ anumodayamī ahu sarvam //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.10_0: ye ca daśaddiśi lokapradīpā bodhivibuddha asaṃgataprāptāḥ /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.10_1: tānahu sarvi adhyeṣami nāthān cakru anuttaru vartanatāyai //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.12_1: yacca śubhaṃ mayi saṃcitu kiṃcidbodhayi nāmayamī ahu sarvam //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.13_0: pūjita bhontu atītaka buddhā ye ca dhriyanti daśaddiśi loke /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.13_1: ye ca anāgata te laghu bhontu pūrṇamanoratha bodhivibuddhāḥ //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.14_0: yāvata keci daśaddiśi kṣetrāste pariśuddha bhavantu udārāḥ /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.15_0: yāvata keci daśaddiśi sattvāste sukhitā sada bhontu arogāḥ /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.15_1: sarvajagasya ca dharmiku artho bhontu pradakṣiṇu ṛdhyatu āśāḥ //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.16_0: bodhicariṃ ca ahaṃ caramāṇo bhavi jātismaru sarvagatīṣu /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.16_1: sarvasu janmasu cyutyupapattī pravrajito ahu nityu bhaveyyā //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.18_1: yāni ca sarvarutāni jagasya sarvaruteṣvahu deśayi dharmam //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.19_0: ye khalu pāramitāsvabhiyukto bodhiyi cittu na jātu vimuhyet /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.19_1: ye 'pi ca pāpaka āvaraṇāyāsteṣu parikṣayu bhotu aśeṣam //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.20_0: karmatu kleśatu mārapathāto lokagatīṣu vimuktu careyam /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.20_1: padma yathā salilena aliptaḥ sūryaśaśī gaganeva asaktaḥ //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.21_0: sarvi apāyadukhāṃ praśamanto sarvajagat sukhi sthāpayamānaḥ /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.21_1: sarvajagasya hitāya careyaṃ yāvata kṣetrapathā diśatāsu //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.22_1: bhadracariṃ ca prabhāvayamānaḥ sarvi anāgatakalpa careyam //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.23_0: ye ca sabhāgata mama caryāye tebhi samāgamu nityu bhaveyyā /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.23_1: kāyatu vācatu cetanato cā ekacari praṇidhāna careyam //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.24_0: ye 'pi ca mitrā mama hitakāmā bhadracarīya nidarśayitāraḥ /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.24_1: tebhi samāgamu nityu bhaveyyā tāṃśca ahaṃ na virāgayi jātu //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.25_0: saṃmukha nityamahaṃ jina paśye buddhasutebhi parīvṛtu nāthān /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.25_1: teṣu ca pūja kareyu udārāṃ sarvi anāgatakalpamakhinnaḥ //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.26_1: bhadracariṃ ca viśodhayamānaḥ sarvi anāgatakalpa careyam //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.27_0: sarvabhaveṣu ca saṃcaramāṇaḥ puṇyatu jñānatu akṣayaprāptaḥ /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.28_0: ekarajāgri rajopamakṣetrā tatra ca kṣetri acintiyabuddhān /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.28_1: buddhasutāna niṣaṇṇaku madhye paśyiya bodhicariṃ caramāṇaḥ //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.32_1: ye 'pi ca kalpa triyadhvapramāṇāstān kṣaṇakoṭipraviṣṭa careyam //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.33_0: ye ca triyadhvagatā narasiṃhāstānahu paśyiya ekakṣaṇena /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.33_1: teṣu ca gocarimotari nityaṃ māyagatena vimokṣabalena //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.35_0: ye ca anāgata lokapradīpāsteṣu vibudhyana cakrapravṛttim /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.35_1: nirvṛtidarśananiṣṭha praśāntiṃ sarvi ahaṃ upasaṃkrami nāthān //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.38_1: mārabalaṃ abalaṃ karamāṇaḥ pūrayi bhadracarībala sarvān //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.41_1: tānahu pūrayi sarvi aśeṣāt bhadracarīya bibudhyiya bodhim //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.42_0: jyeṣṭhaku yaḥ sutu sarvajinānāṃ yasya ca nāma samantatabhadraḥ /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.42_1: tasya vidusya sabhāgacarīye nāmayamī kuśalaṃ imu sarvam //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.43_1: yādṛśanāmana bhadravidusya tādṛśa bhotu samaṃ mama tena //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.44_1: sarvi anāgata kalpamakhinnaḥ pūrayi tāṃ kriya sarvi aśeṣām //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.45_0: no ca pramāṇu bhaveyya carīye no ca pramāṇu bhaveyya guṇānām /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.45_1: apramāṇu cariyāya sthihitvā jānami sarvi vikurvitu teṣām //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.46_0: yāvata niṣṭha nabhasya bhaveyyā sattva aśeṣata niṣṭha tathaiva /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.46_1: karmatu kleśatu yāvata niṣṭhā tāvata niṣṭha mama praṇidhānam //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.47_0: ye ca daśaddiśi kṣetra anantā ratnaalaṃkṛtu dadyu jinānām /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.47_1: divya ca mānuṣa saukhyaviśiṣṭāṃ kṣetrarajopama kalpa dadeyam //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.49_0: varjita tena bhavanti apāyā varjita tena bhavanti kumitrāḥ /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.49_1: kṣipru sa paśyati taṃ amitābhaṃ yasyimu bhadracari praṇidhānam //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.50_0: lābha sulabdha sajīvitu teṣāṃ svāgata te imu mānuṣajanma /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.50_1: yādṛśu so hi samantatabhadraste 'pi tathā nacireṇa bhavanti //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.51_0: pāpaka pañca anantariyāṇi yena ajñānavaśena kṛtāni /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.51_1: so imu bhadracariṃ bhaṇamānaḥ kṣipru parikṣayu neti aśeṣam //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.52_0: jñānatu rūpatu lakṣaṇataśca varṇatu gotratu bhotirūpetaḥ /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.53_0: kṣipru sa gacchati bodhidrumendraṃ gatva niṣīdati sattvahitāya /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.53_1: buddhyati bodhi pravartayi cakraṃ dharṣati māru sasainyaku sarvam //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.54_0: yo imu bhadracaripraṇidhānaṃ dhārayi vācayi deśayito vā /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.54_1: buddhavijānati yo 'tra vipāko bodhi viśiṣṭa ma kāṅkṣa janetha //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.55_0: mañjuśirī yatha jānati śūraḥ so ca samantatabhadra tathaiva /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.55_1: teṣu ahaṃ anuśikṣayamāṇo nāmayamī kuśalaṃ imu sarvam //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.56_1: tāya ahaṃ kuśalaṃ imu sarvaṃ nāmayamī vara bhadracarīye //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.57_0: kālakriyāṃ ca ahaṃ karamāṇo āvaraṇān vinivartiya sarvān /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.57_1: saṃmukha paśyiya taṃ amitābhaṃ taṃ ca sukhāvatikṣetra vrajeyam //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.58_0: tatra gatasya imi praṇidhānā āmukhi sarvi bhaveyyu samagrā /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.58_1: tāṃśca ahaṃ paripūrya aśeṣān sattvahitaṃ kariyāvata loke //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.59_0: tahi jinamaṃḍali śobhaniramye padmavare rūcire upapannaḥ /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.59_1: vyākaraṇaṃ ahu tatra labheyyā saṃmukhato amitābhajinasya //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.60_0: vyākaraṇaṃ pratilabhya ca tasmin nirmita koṭiśatebhiranekaiḥ /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.60_1: sattvahitāni bahūnyahu kuryāṃ dikṣu daśasvapi buddhibalena //
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.61_0: bhadracaripraṇidhāna paṭhitvā yatkuśalaṃ mayi saṃcitu kiṃcit /
SA05bst-108u:busto_17.61_1: ekakṣaṇena samṛdhyatu sarvaṃ tena jagasya śubhaṃ praṇidhānam //
SA05bst-108u:120_0: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 18:
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.1_2: buddho me jayatāṃ jinaḥ sa bhagavān taddeśanā nirmalā
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.1_5: varṣantu stanayitnavaśca samaye maitrīṃ labhantāṃ prajāḥ //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.1_10: kaḥ sevyo buddhimadbhirvadata vadata me bhrātarasteṣu muktyai //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.4_0: namo buddhāya gurave namo dharmāya śāsine /
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.4_1: namaḥ saṅghāya mahate tribhyo 'pi satataṃ namaḥ //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.4_6: jitānaṅgaiḥ sevyaṃ bhavatu mama tadvastu śaraṇam //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.4_14: sadīyaṃ sarvīyaṃ bhavatu mama tad vastu śaraṇam //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.4_19: kvacinnīlaṃ pītaṃ kvacidapi ca raktaṃ kvacidapi
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.4_30: dṛśāṃ navyātithyaṃ bhavatu mama tad vastu śaraṇam //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.13_0: punarapi śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi buddhaṃ punarapi lokaguruṃ guruṃ karomi /
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.13_1: punarapi kathayāmi naumi vande, tvayi mama gautama naiva tṛptirāste //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.14_1: śaraṇamayamayañca daivatamme gatiraparā mama nāsti nāsti nāsti //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.15_1: namo buddhāya dharmāya saṅghāya ca namo namaḥ //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.16_0: bho vītarāga bhagavaṃstava pādameva vande munīndra muhurevamimaṃ pravande /
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.16_1: bhūyaḥ punaḥ punarimaṃ parataḥ parastāt pārśvadvayorupari dikṣu vidikṣu vande //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.17_0: gatamiha bhavatā pathā ca yena sthitamapi yatra ca yatra vā niṣaṇṇam /
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.17_1: śayitamapi munīndra yatra yogāt tadapi śataṃ praṇamāmi puṇyatīrtham //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.18_0: samajani bhagavān svayaṃ sma yasmin sakalamabodhi ca yatra dharmacakram /
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.21_1: yaṃ prāpya māravijayānupadaṃ prapede sarvajñatāṃ sa bhagavān tamahaṃ namāmi //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.21_2: mūrddhan buddhaṃ nama tvaṃ śravaṇa śṛṇu sadā dharmamadvaidhavādi
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.21_3: proktaṃ sarvatra rūpaṃ nayana nirupamaṃ paśya jighrāṅaghripadmam /
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.21_4: ghrāṇa tvaṃ cārkabandhoḥ stuhi sakhi rasane śrīghanaṃ pūjayethāḥ
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.21_5: siddhaṃ pāṇe vrajāṅghre jinasadanamadasmadguṇaṃ citta cintya //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.21_8: eṣo 'haṃ tatparaḥ syāmparamayanamito nāsti me satyametat
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.21_10: nāhaṃ lābhārcanārthī na ca bhayacakito nāpi satkīrtikāmo
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.21_11: na tvaṃ dharmāṃśuvaṃśaprabhava iti mune nāpi vidyāśayā te /
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.21_12: pāramparyānnaca tvāṃ śaraṇamupagataḥ kintu te sārvajanyaṃ
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.21_13: samyagjñānaṃ samīkṣya tvayi bhavajaladhiṃ santarītuṃ pravṛttaḥ //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.21_16: bhūpā vā yadi daṇḍayanti vibudhā nindanti vā bāndhavā
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.21_17: muñcanti kṣaṇamapyahaṃ jina pitarjīvāmi na tvāṃ vinā //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.21_18: svarge vā vasatirmamāstu niraye tiryakṣu kiṃ vāsure
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.21_25: guro buddhasvāmin mama janaka māṃ pāhi bhavataḥ //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.21_26: pitā mātā bhrātā tvamasi bhaginī tvaṃ ca vipadi
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.21_28: tvamaiśvaryyaṃ bhogo tvamasi dhanadhānyaṃ ca mahimā
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.21_29: yaśo vidyā prāṇastvamasi mama sarvajña sakalam //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.29_1: adhigatāmṛta buddha mano 'mbujaṃ mama tavānagha gandhakuṭīyatām //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.30_1: tvamekosi māṃ trātumīśo dayābdhe prabho 'taḥ prasīda prasīda prasīda //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.31_0: prasīdeśa deveśa lokeśa jiṣṇo jagadvandya madvandya sadvandya buddha /
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.31_1: aghore bhavāre smarāre tamore tavaivāsmi bhakto vapurvāṅmanobhiḥ //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.32_0: sa tava kulasutaḥ sa eva bhaktaḥ sa bhavati śāsanadhūrvahaḥ sa śiṣyaḥ /
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.32_1: sa ca śaraṇagataḥ sa eva dāsaḥ kathamapi yo na vilaṅghayet tavājñām //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.33_0: jagadupakṛtireva buddha! pūjā tadapakṛtistava lokanātha! pīḍā /
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.33_1: jina jagadapakṛt kathaṃ na lajje gaditumahaṃ tava pādapadmabhaktaḥ //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.34_1: tamahitamapakartturasya lokaṃ kva mama kṛpā muditā kva vā ca maitrī //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.35_1: api ca viṣayiṇo na mokṣasiddhiḥ kimu karavāṇi munīndra dehi dāsyam //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.37_1: tava kathamanuyāmi dharmanāvaṃ jina mama dehi kṛpākarāvalambam //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.38_1: dhara gurutaratṛṣṇayā patantaṃ jina mama dehi kṛpākarāvalambam //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.39_0: jagati tava kṛpā hi nirviśeṣā prapavatayā jina māṃ ca doṣaduṣṭam /
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.39_1: alamahamiaha no sukhī bhavendurna samakaraścaratīva sādhvasādhve(dhvoḥ) //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.41_0: akaravamuruduṣkṛtaṃ purā yad mama vapuṣā manasā ca cetasā ca /
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.41_1: anukalamakhilaṃ pralīyatāṃ tat tava caraṇasmaraṇena sarvavedin //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.42_0: sugata tava puraḥ puraḥ pṛthivyāṃ madhuramate patito 'smi daṇḍanatyā /
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.42_1: akuśalamakhilaṃ tavānubhāvāt prapatatu notpatatāt punaḥ sahaiva //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.43_0: tava caraṇasarojameva vande tava padapaṅkajameva pūjayāmi /
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.43_1: tava padayugameva bhāvaye 'haṃ tava padameva sadaiva daivataṃ me //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.44_0: kamapi na kathayāmi nārcayāmi kamapi na naumi na cintayāmi nehe /
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.44_1: kamapi na śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi hitvā tava caraṇaṃ pitarasmi kiṅkaraste //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.45_0: sadasi sadasi vāci siddhaṃ pathi pathi sadmani sadmanīha buddham /
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.45_1: bhuvi bhuvi mama vāri vāri cetaḥ kalayatu nityamimaṃ hi lokanātham //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.46_1: svapimi niśi nidhāya yaddhṛdi tvāṃ na mama samaṃ virahastvayā ta eva //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.47_0: mama tadiha dinaṃ hi durdinaṃ syād aśitaghanasthagitaṃ na durdinaṃ me /
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.48_0: amṛtada ṣaḍabhijña dharmarāja tribhuvanavandya munīndra gotameti /
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.49_0: daśabala jina siddha vajrabuddhe sugata tathāgata buddha śākyasiṃha /
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.49_1: iti nigadati yaḥ kvacit kadācit tamabhinamāmyapi dāsavaṃśajātam //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.50_1: kavivara vadatāṃvareśa śuddhodanasuta śākyamune mune prasīda //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.51_0: amṛtamapi nipīya nirjarendra punarapi te 'pi śunīstanaṃ dhayanti /
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.51_1: sakṛdapi tava vāksudhārasajño na viśati jātu sa mātureva garbham //
SA05bst-108u:busto_18.52_1: kuru mama karuṇaṃ diśo na jāne guru tadavekṣya ca tiryagādiduḥkham //
